If that's not quite your cup of tea, I'd recommend "The Green Mile" instead. This one has a strong focus on characters and their stories, with Tom Hanks bringing his signature warmth to the role of Paul Edgecombe, a corrections officer who befriends a wrongly accused man on death row. The movie also explores themes of morality and redemption, which might resonate with you!
